{"name": "Community Basic Organization", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Must be registered on Plentiful App
* Appointments required. Please call: 718 731-6360
* Closed for the summer (July and August) every year..
* A to M on 1st Friday 
* N to Z on 2nd Friday
* Seniors 65+ on 3rd Friday", "email": "", "url": "http://www.thedccsite.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2038 Davidson Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10453", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8535636, "longitude": -73.90847149999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 731-6360", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed: Wednesday & Friday in July and August"}]}
